channel.title: Assassin+ - Few Changes (Suggestion)
channel.description:
>[color=purple]Assassin[/color] I have a few suggestions to add a new level of bussing/"confirming" assassin 1. Make assassin able to poison himself. This way in the late game with a healer left, assassin can be able to "confirm" himself, and this way you can poison sus people late game and people will say "don't heal him its assassin trying to confirm himself".
2. Make assassin suicide **have a deathnote**. This way mastermind can claim knight, claims to have cs'd him when in reality it was assassin suicide plus a deathnote saying "knight".
3. Buff assassins distract! My suggestion: **Day Ability (Distract)** - Make a player unable to talk for 15 seconds, and be unable to vote+use day abilites for 15 seconds. _2 uses_.

item.title: Assassin+ - Few Changes (Suggestion)
item.dc:creator: Scl007
item.description:
I made a segustion to hyper buff Distract as it is way to weak for an only 2 use ability

My Distract

Prevent a player from talking or reading the chat for 20 seconds

Read full topic

item.title: Assassin+ - Few Changes (Suggestion)
item.dc:creator: TheVideoChipmunk
item.description:
Assassin
I have a few suggestions to add a new level of bussing/“confirming” assassin

  1. Make assassin able to poison himself. This way in the late game with a healer left, assassin can be able to “confirm” himself, and this way you can poison sus people late game and people will say “don’t heal him its assassin trying to confirm himself”.

  2. Make assassin suicide have a deathnote. This way mastermind can claim knight, claims to have cs’d him when in reality it was assassin suicide plus a deathnote saying “knight”.

  3. Buff assassins distract! My suggestion:
    Day Ability (Distract) - Make a player unable to talk for 15 seconds, and be unable to vote+use day abilites for 15 seconds. 2 uses.

Read full topic
